sentences.english: Objective To improve the treatment of refractory clubfoot in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高兒童頑固性馬蹄內翻足畸形的治療效果。

sentences.english: It will break down the toughest grease and grime.
But, I'm a diehard Post-Its fan.
sentences.chinese: 但是，我是一個頑固後它的球迷。

sentences.english: Terry is so bullheaded; he won't listen to anybody else's opinion.
sentences.chinese: 特利如此頑固，他聽不進別人的意見。

sentences.english: Its final aim was to repulse the third anti-communist upsurge launched by the KMT diehards.
sentences.chinese: 其最終目的是打退國民黨頑固派發起的三次反共高潮。

sentences.english: Gates found their recalcitrance equally frustrating.
sentences.chinese: 蓋茨發現他們頑固不化同樣感到沮喪。

sentences.english: He is an obstinate guy just like his father.
sentences.chinese: 他是像他父親一樣頑固的傢伙。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the curative effect of synergsim on headstrong heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討聯合用藥治療頑固性心力衰竭的療效。

sentences.english: But if he obdurately resists change, we need a plan B.
sentences.chinese: 但如果他仍頑固拒絕變革，我們就需要一套備用方案。

sentences.english: Give the unprogressive and acing imposing the rhythm The sex massage of tap the function .
sentences.chinese: 給頑固的痠疼處以節奏性按摩的拍打機能。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical effectiveness of hemispherectomy on intractable epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討大腦半球切除術治療頑固性癲癇的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: But ignorance and misinformation about the health hazards of beryllium die hard.
sentences.chinese: 關於健康的破壞物鈹的無知和誤傳是很頑固的。

sentences.english: There was in him a headstrong little man who hated Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 在他心裏早就有個憎恨拿破崙的頑固小人兒了。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce the surgical experience in treating intractable occipital lobe epilepsy.
sentences.chinese: 目的總結頑固性枕葉癲癇患者的手術治療經驗。

sentences.english: The die-hards of today are precisely such double-dealers.
sentences.chinese: 現在的頑固分子，就是這種兩面派。

sentences.english: The stubborn delusions of the political elite provide the second reason.
sentences.chinese: 第二個原因則是政界精英頑固的妄想。

definition: variant of 反覆|反复[fan3 fu4]
to believe (sth in relation to oneself)/to regard oneself as/to acknowledge (sth in relation to oneself)/to resign oneself to
to expend a great deal of effort
